mapper.select: select sol.*, va1.attr_name as operateTypeName, va2.attr_name as operateStatusName from sys_operate_log sol left join (select attr_value, attr_name from v_sys_dict_attr where dict_code = 'operate-type') va1 on va1.attr_value = concat(sol.operate_type, '') left join (select attr_value, attr_name from v_sys_dict_attr where dict_code = 'operate-status') va2 on va2.attr_value = concat(sol.operate_status, '') where 1 = 1 [[ and sol.operate_user_name like concat('%', #operateUserName#, '%') ]] [[ and sol.description like concat('%', #description#, '%') ]] [[ and sol.operate_type = #operateType# ]] [[ and sol.operate_status = #operateStatus# ]] [[ and sol.operate_time >= #operateTimeStart# ]] [[ and sol.operate_time < #operateTimeEnd# ]]
